short.am,ar,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Get the ranking of the best selling books for this week.
short.bg: Намерете класация на най-продаваните книги за тази седмица.
short.de: Holen Sie sich die Rangliste der meistverkauften Bücher für diese Woche
short.es: Obtener el ranking de los libros más vendidos de la semana
short.fr: Obtenez le classement des meilleurs livres de vente pour cette semaine
short.ru: Получить рейтинг самых продаваемых книг для этой недели
short.uk: Отримати рейтинг найбільш продаваних книг для цього тижня

long.am,ar,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
Get the ranking of the best-selling books for the week according to 
 - New York Times, 
 - USA Today and 
 - Amazon.com. 

Keep track of the book rankings and their trends.

Receive information about 
 - author tours, 
 - book signings, 
 - interviews and other events.

Fast access to your favorite books, audio books and e-books in Flexi eBooks web site.
long.bg,de,es,fr,ru,uk:
Get the ranking of the best-selling books for the week according to New York Times, USA Today and Amazon.com. Keep track of the book rankings and their trends.
Receive information about author tours, book signings, interviews and other events.
Tightly integrated with Flexi eBooks web site, this extension gives you fast access to your favorite books, audio books and e-books.
